WARNING: Notice icons are the lower case names such as 'account_circle' on https://fonts.google.com/icons?selected=Material+Icons

notices.description: Sports day is tomorrow, please remember to wear a PE kit and may the best form win
Non-uniform day is next friday, please remember to wear a blazer
Well done to ST3 for being the highest scoring student in Quizlet
Scores aren’t everything! If your mental health is suffering stay safe and reach out to a teacher or other adult you trust

wotw.definition: conducive to maintaining health and preventing disease, especially by being clean; sanitary.
wotw.example: the toilets didn’t have very hygienic conditions
